---
title: Task View
sidebar:
  order: 9
---

<!-- auto-generated by sync-docs -->

## Overview

The task view displays project tasks from any source (GitHub Issues, markdown files, or custom providers) directly in the navi dashboard via a pluggable provider system.

## Quick Start

1. Create a `.navi.yaml` in your project root:

```yaml
tasks:
  provider: "markdown-tasks"
  args:
    path: "docs/delivery"
```

2. Press `T` in navi to toggle the task panel

## Using the Task Panel

The task panel appears alongside the session list. Tasks are grouped by project or category.

### Keybindings

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `T` | Toggle task panel visibility |
| `Tab` | Focus task panel (when visible) |
| `↑` / `↓` | Navigate tasks |
| `Space` | Expand / collapse task group |
| `/` | Search tasks |
| `Enter` | Open task (URL or file viewer) |
| `r` | Refresh tasks |
| `[` / `]` | Resize task panel |
| `Esc` | Return focus to session list |

## Task Providers

### Built-in: markdown-tasks

Scans markdown files for task definitions. Designed for projects using the delivery documentation pattern.

```yaml
tasks:
  provider: "markdown-tasks"
  args:
    path: "docs/delivery"    # Directory to scan
```

### Built-in: github-issues

Fetches issues from a GitHub repository using the `gh` CLI.

```yaml
tasks:
  provider: "github-issues"
  args:
    repo: "owner/repo"
```

### Custom Providers

Any executable script that outputs the standard JSON format works as a provider. The script receives arguments from the `args` field in `.navi.yaml`.

Expected output format:

```json
{
  "groups": [
    {
      "id": "group-1",
      "title": "Sprint 1",
      "status": "in_progress",
      "url": "https://...",
      "tasks": [
        {
          "id": "task-1",
          "title": "Fix login bug",
          "status": "todo",
          "assignee": "alice",
          "labels": ["bug", "auth"],
          "priority": 1,
          "url": "https://...",
          "created": "2026-01-01T00:00:00Z",
          "updated": "2026-01-02T00:00:00Z"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

## Configuration

### Per-Project (`.navi.yaml`)

```yaml
tasks:
  provider: "markdown-tasks"
  args:
    path: "docs/delivery"
  interval: "30s"              # Refresh interval (optional)
```

### Global (`~/.navi/config.yaml`)

```yaml
tasks:
  default_provider: "markdown-tasks"
  interval: "30s"
```

Task results are cached and refreshed at the configured interval (default 30 seconds).

## Related Features

- [Content Viewer](/features/content-viewer/) — View task detail files in-app
- [Search and Filter](/features/search-and-filter/) — Search across tasks
